tool_description: Get complete Airport Details by ICAO, IATA or Local IDs. AirportGuide.com has compiled data for over 30 years from multiple sources around the world to provide the best quality global landing facility data. Our database contains over 60,000 airports, heliports, balloonports, seaplane bases, ultralight fields, gliderports, and spaceports. In addition to airport details, we have airline routes, nearby airports, airport delays, aviation calculators, METAR & TAF, airlines, airmen, and FBOs/fuel.
name: Airport Guide - Aviation Info
title: Airport Guide - Aviation Info

api_list.name: Airline by Country
api_list.description: Retrieve a list of airlines by entering the country code. The successful call returns the following data: Airline Name, IATA ID, ICAO ID, Country, Airline Url, Call Signs.Airportguide provides Country Data List: https://airportguide.com/search/browse-airports-by-country/ Condition Apply: API accepts offset till 5 only. Contact us for more!

required_parameters.name: country
required_parameters.description: Pass the Country code, Don't have Country code list? Refer AirportGuide's Country List here: https://airportguide.com/search/browse-airports-by-country

api_list.name: Airline by Code(IATA, ICAO)
api_list.description: Retrieve an airline detail by entering the Code(IATA, ICAO). The successful call returns the following data: Airline Name, IATA ID, ICAO ID, Country, Country code, Airline Url, Call Signs.

required_parameters.name: code
required_parameters.description: Enter the IATA or ICAO code for the airline.  Example: WSN, AA, UA, etc.

api_list.name: Airline by Name
api_list.description: Retrieve an airline detail by entering the Airline Name. The successful call returns the following data: Airline Name, IATA ID, ICAO ID, Country, Country code, Airline Url, Call Signs.

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: airline_name Enter the airline name.  Example: American Airlines, Advanced Air, etc.

api_list.name: Get TAF Detail
api_list.description: Get current Terminal Area Forecast (TAF) details given any latitude/longitude combination.

required_parameters.name: lat
required_parameters.description: Pass Latitude 39.83

required_parameters.name: long
required_parameters.description: Pass Longitude -104.65

api_list.name: Sunset Sunrise
api_list.description: Get the sunrise, sunset, civil twilight, nautical twilight, astronomical twilight, and high noon times for any latitude and longitude. Airportguide provides Timezone Data List: https://airportguide.com/api_mashapp/inc/timezone.php

required_parameters.name: latitude
required_parameters.description: Pass latitude 37.795356

required_parameters.name: longitude
required_parameters.description: pass longitude -122.39625699999999

required_parameters.name: time_zone
required_parameters.description: Imp: Timezone \\\"/\\\" should be replaces by  %2F

api_list.name: Offline - All Delays US
api_list.description: Retrieve real-time airport ground delays for US and Southern Canadian airports.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://forteweb-airportguide-airport-basic-info-v1.p.rapidapi.com/us_delay.php"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "forteweb-airportguide-airport-basic-info-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://forteweb-airportguide-airport-basic-info-v1.p.rapidapi.com/us_delay.php"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "forteweb-airportguide-airport-basic-info-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Airport Details by Use, Country, Type, and City
api_list.description:
Retrieve a list of airports by entering the country and one or more of the following optional fields: airport use (public, private, military), facility type and city name. The successful call returns the following data: Airport Name, IATA ID, ICAO ID, City, State, Country, Latitude, Longitude. Airportguide provides Country Data List: https://airportguide.com/search/browse-airports-by-country/
Note: The results are limited to 5000 records.

required_parameters.name: city
required_parameters.description: Name of the city

required_parameters.name: airport_use
required_parameters.description: Enter the landing facility use (public, private, military).

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: Valid landing facility types are: Airport, Balloonport, Gliderport, Heliport, Seaplane Base, or Ultralight

required_parameters.name: country
required_parameters.description: Enter the code of the country. e.g. country=CA

api_list.name: Airport Count by Use and Country
api_list.description: An Api Call which returns: Enter the Country Name to get the total number of airports in the country and the totals by Landing Facility Use. Airportguide provides Country Data List: https://airportguide.com/search/browse-airports-by-country/

required_parameters.name: country
required_parameters.description: Enter the CODE of the country. e.g. Country=CA

api_list.name: Airport Count by Type and Country
api_list.description: Enter the Country Code to get the total number of airports in the country and the totals by Landing Facility Type (Airport, Balloonport, Gliderport, Heliport, Seaplane Base, Ultralight). Airportguide provides Country Data List: https://airportguide.com/search/browse-airports-by-country/

required_parameters.name: country
required_parameters.description: Enter the Code of the country. e.g. country=CA

api_list.name: Airport Details given an Airport ID
api_list.description: Enter an airport ID (FAA, IATA, ICAO, local) and get general information regarding that airport.

required_parameters.name: airport_id
required_parameters.description: Enter the airport ID. This can be an IATA ID, ICAO ID, FAA ID, TC ID, or any locally used ID for that airport.

api_list.name: GET AIRMEN
api_list.description: The Airmen Search will search the FAA's Airmen Certification database by name, location, rating, medical class, and more. Retrieve Airmen by using Airportguide Data system.

required_parameters.name: last_name
required_parameters.description: Pass Last Name and Get Airmen Details

optional_parameters.name: param
optional_parameters.description: Pass Json format for multiple parameters, use above as a example.

api_list.name: Airport Details by IATA
api_list.description: Enter an IATA airport ID and get general information regarding that airport.

required_parameters.name: airport_id
required_parameters.description: Enter the IATA airport ID to receive the airport's details.

api_list.name: Nearby Airports
api_list.description: API allows first 20 Nearby Airports according to Latitude and Longitude given by API User. API call also accepts Miles( not mandatory). A successful call returns the following data: City Name, Country, State, State Code, Latitude, Longitude, Airport Code, and Distance etc.

required_parameters.name: lat
required_parameters.description: Pass latitude 33.942495

required_parameters.name: lng
required_parameters.description: pass longitude -118.408068

api_list.name: Get METAR Detail
api_list.description: Get current METAR details given any latitude/longitude combination. The API finds METAR reports within a user-specified distance.

required_parameters.name: distance
required_parameters.description: Radial distance from the location. Example: 5 miles

required_parameters.name: long
required_parameters.description: Pass longitude -104.65

required_parameters.name: lat
required_parameters.description: Pass latitude 39.83

api_list.name: OFFLINE - FBO & FUEL
api_list.description: The FBO & FUEL API will search airport Fixed Based Operators by airport, fuel, services, and more. Review Parameter List.

required_parameters.name: code
required_parameters.description: Get FBO & Fuel Search by Code, this is mandatory Parameter when you request for detail. You need to pass AIRPORT code LAX

optional_parameters.name: param
optional_parameters.description: Airportguide provides accurate Data, Be specific what you searched by this saves your time and Query returns more accurate result. An optional Parameter List: business_name, services, fuel_brand, fuel_grade, offset. You need to pass json format parameters similar to above example.
